articles.description: A much-changed France side overcome Uruguay in Lille to maintain their winning start at their home World Cup.
articles.title: France earn victory over spirited Uruguay side

articles.description: England beat Sri Lanka by 161 runs to seal a convincing 2-0 ODI series victory and bounce back from surprise T20 series defeat.
articles.title: England crush SL after Sciver-Brunt record century

articles.description: Manchester United winger Jadon Sancho will train away from the first team until issues between the player and manager Erik ten Hag are resolved, the club has confirmed.
articles.title: Sancho to train separately from Man Utd first team

articles.description: BBC pundit Garth Crooks tipping newly-promoted Luton Town to be relegated by Christmas is "disrespectful", says Luton boss Rob Edwards.
articles.title: Crooks' comments 'disrespectful' - Luton boss Edwards

articles.description: Newly turned professional Ludvig Aberg warms up for the Ryder Cup with an impressive opening round at the BMW PGA Championship.
articles.title: Aberg warms up for Ryder Cup by outscoring McIlroy

articles.description: Watch highlights as England thrash Sri Lanka by 161 runs to secure a 2-0 series victory behind a superb 120 runs by Nat Sciver-Brunt and Charlie Dean's 5-31.
articles.title: Sciver-Brunt century secures England series win over SL

articles.description: Irish trainer Luke Comer is banned from racing for three years after 12 of his horses tested positive for banned anabolic steroids.
articles.title: Irish trainer Comer banned over steroids in horses

articles.description: Watch Charlie Dean's superbly take three wickets in an over for England against Sri Lanka in their third ODI.
articles.title: 'Tearing through Sri Lanka!' - Dean takes three wickets in over

articles.description: Johnny Sexton stays in the Ireland team for Saturday's World Cup game against Tonga, which has four personnel changes from the win over Romania.
articles.title: Sexton named in strong Ireland team for Tonga game

articles.description: England's Rachel Daly, Alex Greenwood, Lauren James and Keira Walsh are among the nominees for the Fifa Best Awards.
articles.title: Lionesses and Hermoso nominated for Fifa women's awards
